titleStmt.title: The life of the blessed virgin, Sainct Catharine of Siena Drawne out of all them that had written it from the beginning. And written in Italian by the reuerend Father, Doctor Caterinus Senensis. And now translated into Englishe out of the same Doctor, by Iohn Fen priest & confessar to the Englishe nunnes at Louaine.
Vita di S. Catarina da Siena. English
titleStmt.author: Raymond, of Capua, 1330-1399.

titleStmt.title: The life of the blessed virgin, Sainct Catharine of Siena Drawne out of all them that had written it from the beginning. And written in Italian by the reuerend Father, Doctor Caterinus Senensis. And now translated into Englishe out of the same Doctor, by Iohn Fen priest & confessar to the Englishe nunnes at Louaine.
Vita di S. Catarina da Siena. English
titleStmt.author: Raymond, of Capua, 1330-1399.
Fenn, John, 1535-1614.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by C. Boscard] With permission of superiors,

notesStmt.note: A translation of an Italian translation by Ambrosianus Catherinus of a Latin version of: Raymond of Capua. Vita di S. Catarina da Siena.
Printer's name and place of publication from STC.
Much of text is paginated with even numbers on rectos.
Running title reads: The life of the blessed virgin S. Catharine of Siena.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
